text: Kosy please. You are killing me.
author: Cruiser

text: I never played this, but the music has hints of a majestic forrest and an uplifting objective.
author: KevTheBarbarian

text: Ah, I can still remember the nights I would just leave the game on just to listen to this tune. Such times they were.

text: The intro sound effect is awesome.

text: So rich and smooth.
author: batlin

text: And the memories come flooooooding back.
author: blue_tetris

text: A dozen other spectacular songs done by the London Symphony Orchestra for this game and you had to pick the information menu music.  WTF
author: Stewie G

text: Love this! I hope Xenoblade X will have a few tracks like this one.
author: Blade of Mird

text: I spent so much time reading to this music. My brother called it the floaty bunny music.
author: Matthew Fry

text: Nice stress relief from a lot of the chaotic areas... the bouncin' bunny helps too.
author: Sephiko

text: Yeah. It really needs the bouncing bunny.
author: Matthew Fry

text: I recently finished Episode I around a month ago! Really enjoyed the OST, the vocal tracks especially since they brought me back to Xenogears

text: its a nice relaxing tune i find also this game rocks

text: This is one of my personal favorites. It just makes you feel some kind of way.

text: shame this series didnt get the traction namco wanted. They were going to make alot more initially :(

text: This game is amazeballs as a trilogy!!  :-)

text: So chill and groovin', yo.
author: Jonochrome

text: Man I remember when I would just sit and listen whenever this theme would play in game and just be entranced by the calming beauty and elegance to this amazing theme. Really nice choice!
author: Azure Alufei

text: That really helped me relax just now! Thanks!
author: daneofurexistence

text: I've always liked this relaxing theme from this game. Still one of my favorite stories in an RPG (when taking the trilogy as a whole). As much as I like the medieval swords & dragons setting, I'd love to have more RPGs taking place in the far future.
author: SupraDarky

text: Xenosaga honestly has some very relaxing music.  It kinda has this MMORPG vibe to it.
author: LeonisBrafer

text: Oh, i love xenosaga, this music was always relaxing, a break after all that griding for me, jeje.
